name: Sky Advertising
description: We’re committed to world-class marketing that helps you stand out, advertising that generates a measurable return,  and personal service that makes your life easier. Founded in 1989, Sky Advertising is a leading boutique agency with offices in New York City and Philadelphia. Our clients range from Fortune 500 companies to small nonprofits. The industries we serve include real estate, healthcare, education, social services, engineering, the arts, manufacturing and retail.
